name: Imageview
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Imageview 6 is a 4th generation image gallery script, using AJAX to deliver the best version yet.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<td (width="160"|rowspan="2")><iframe allowtransparency="yes" frameborder="0" height="100%" width="100%" scrolling="auto" title="(frmcontent|frmlist)" name="(frmcontent|frmlist)" src="albumlist.php\?album=[^"]*"><\/iframe><\/td>)
(?-mix:<title>Imageview ([\d]{1}) :: (By Jorge Schrauwen|User Settings|Upload Image|Album View|Administration|RSS Feeds|Install)<\/title>)
